creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: large hollow torque with raised designs; dragon and phoenix on either side of central medallion which has foliate designs surrounding Asian characters; below medallion two spiral designs; two large spirals at top with two more spirals attached with rings to main body; closure attaches with hooks to top rings on uppermost spirals; eight hollow tubes attached to bottom edge; lower edge of body is scalloped foliate designs between spirals on main body
title: Torque
